content: Company based in SingaporeThis article **is an orphan, as no other articles link to it**. Please introduce links to this page from related articles. *(December 2025)* **Haato & co.** (formerly **Gelato di Crema**) is a retailer of [dessert](/wiki/Dessert) based in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), operating a chain of [cafes](/wiki/Cafes), and run by the **Dessert Empire Private Limited**. A Haato cafe is run either by a [franchisee](/wiki/Franchisee) or the corporation itself. Haato primarily sells [gelato](/wiki/Gelato), [yoghurt](/wiki/Yoghurt), [sorbet](/wiki/Sorbet), [waffles](/wiki/Waffles), [pastries](/wiki/Pastries), [beverages](/wiki/Beverages) and hot food. As of 2011, there are seven Haato outlets across [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It was ranked second on the list of five best gelato shops in Singapore. - Official website This Asia-based restaurant or restaurant chain article is a stub. title: Haato
